name: RadioTowerFM
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio tower f. m.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Rádio Torre FM de Janaúba Founded on July 6, 1990, it offers musical and informative programming. Today, with the most modern equipment, we have computerized the station with cutting-edge audio programs and the best professionals in the radio industry, always concerned with offering total credibility to our customers and listeners, seeking excellence in service and a QUALITY radio station.

Over the years, the station has received several Certificates for its differentiated line of work. It stands out as a broadcasting station. It has an open space for debates on topics of interest to society and for the provision of services.

The musical programming has been characterized as an alternative to the segmentation of current FM stations in the country, offering the public the best of all rhythms in the Brazilian music scene, from MPB to Rock.

Today we work with 5,000 Watts of Power and a reserve transmitter, in addition to offering Internet users access from anywhere in the world through our website.

Radio Torre FM is a radio station that has become part of the cultural history of our region, and has the best cost-benefit ratio in local advertising.

That's why people feel at ease on our radio station, where you can find lots of music, humor, information, entertainment and good taste.

Radio Torre FM is not only the favorite radio station in the region, but it is also the lifestyle of our youth and community.
